original_title: the GazettE STANDING TOUR 2006 NAMELESS LIBERTY SIX GUNS TOUR FINAL AT BUDOKAN
overview: Visual Kei quintet the GazettE present their Standing Live Tour Nameless Liberty. Six Guns.... Vocalist Ruki, guitarists Uruha and Aoi, bassist Reita, and drummer Kai more than lived up to their image as a high-quality live band during their tour, performing at 34 venues all over Japan. According to the latest news, Gazette will continue their live stroll across Japan during their Decomposition Beauty tour which has been scheduled for November and December.
title: the GazettE STANDING TOUR 2006 NAMELESS LIBERTY SIX GUNS TOUR FINAL AT BUDOKAN
